short_summary: The Central Experimental Farm in Ottawa seeks bids to replace the roof on Building 74.
description: A request for proposal has been issued to award a contract to a contractor for the construction of a roof replacement on Building 74 located at Central Experimental Farm.
full_summary:
### Roof Replacement - Building 74 - Central Experimental Farm Ottawa
#### Tender Ref.: cb-676-51149001
#### Amendment No.: 7
#### Solicitation No.: 01B46-23-207

The Government of Canada has issued a tender for the replacement of the roof on Building 74 at the Central Experimental Farm in Ottawa. The tender seeks a contractor for this specific project.

**Project Details**

*   **Location**: Ottawa, ON
*   **Procurement Category**: Rehabilitation Services - Construction
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Date of Publication**: December 19, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024, at 2:00 pm (EST)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 15, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Evaluation Criteria**

*   Bidders will be assessed on their lowest price submission.

**Attachments**

To access the tender documents, please see the following links:
*   [Invitation to Tender](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27936/invitation-to-tender-01b46-23-207.pdf)
*   [Contract Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27936/qa3.pdf)
*   [CEF Map](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27936/cef-map-2014.pdf)
*   [QA-1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27936/qa-1.pdf)
*   [QA-2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27936/qa2.pdf)

**Contact Information**

If you have any questions or require clarification on any aspect of this tender, please contact:

Claudia Lauzier
Email: [claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca)
Phone: (438) 455-2392

Note: I kept everything the same except added or modified sections where it was necessary to better match
